name: Cast Out Colony
description:
Cast Out Colony fuses roguelite gameplay, bullet-heaven action, and intricate town-building components to craft an entirely distinctive experience, redefining the roguelite survival genre.

You have been cast out from your colony for committing an unspeakable crime. You are now tasked with building your own colony. Sounds easy, right? Well, the swarms of hungry, hungry insectivores might say otherwise. But remember, if your colony is thriving, the better chance you have at surviving!


  • Multiple playable characters

    Choose from a variety of adorable arthropods and not-so-creepy crawlies, each with their own unique skills and characteristics.

  • Robust roguelite action

    Choose from a variety of active and passive skills as you level up and fight your way through the never-ending hordes of beasties and baddies. Stick with your favorites, or experiment with something new; either way, no two runs will ever be quite the same!

  • Detailed town building

    Build your own colony and increase it's inhabitants, some of which will help you in your survival! Growing your colony provides bonuses, both permanent and temporary, meaning the stronger you build your colony, the stronger your character can become.
